bibl.title: Polybius and the Papyrus: The Persuasiveness of P. Rylands III 491.
bibl.note: It is probably right to see P. Ryl. III, 491 (= Pack2 2212) as the epitome of a larger original. Proof is impossible, but Fabius Pictor deserves to be considered a good candidate as Ur-Autor of the papyrus.
bibl.seg: HOYOS Dexter, Polybius and the Papyrus: The Persuasiveness of P. Rylands III 491.

It is probably right to see P. Ryl. III, 491 (= Pack2 2212) as the epitome of a larger original. Proof is impossible, but Fabius Pictor deserves to be considered a good candidate as Ur-Autor of the papyrus.
